title: Genetic diversity, population structure and marker-trait associations in Indian kale (Brassica oleracea L. gp. acephala) using cross-species microsatellite markers
content:
Publication date: 30 April 2024

Source: Heliyon, Volume 10, Issue 8

Author(s): Geetika Malik, Asma Jabeen, Javid Iqbal Mir, Rafiq Ahmad Shah, Mohd Abas Shah, Vishal Dinkar, Muneer Ahmad Sheikh, Ravinder Kumar, Om Chand Sharma, Mahendra Kumar Verma
